des: "The rosemary infuses the flavor of the tequila while the lemon provides a hint of sweetness in this refreshing margarita that goes perfectly with all kinds of appetizers and grilled foods."
ins: Combine lemons, club soda, sugar and tequila in pitcher. Mix well. Refrigerate until cold. Place 1 rosemary sprig in each of the 4 serving cups. Pour margarita and drink cold or iced.
